title.rendered: Best Time to visit Goa – Weather & Climate

content.rendered:
Goa is already famous for being one of the best beach destinations in India. It also attracts adventure lovers as well as peace seekers from all over the world. If you plan carefully then Goa can be visited throughout the year. Host to numerous famous festivals, fairs, and musical festivals, this place is all about colorful culture and vibrant experiences no matter when you decide to visit. Knowing when the right time is to visit Goa will play a crucial role in making your trip memorable or not. Here is everything you need to know about the best time to visit Goa.

Best Time to Visit Goa

November to February is without a doubt, the best time to visit Goa. The reason being, Goa is located in the southern hemisphere, and going there during the peak summer season would mean that the sun is out always and you would be sweating profusely and won’t be able to enjoy every sightseeing opportunity with complete ease and thrill. November to February is the best month to plan a trip to Goa. The weather is much more pleasant and it remains an ideal situation for complete sightseeing of both north and south Goa. The monsoon season of June to September is another good few months to visit Goa since the prices are also very low and cost-effective. However, the autumn-winter months are the best time to travel since you will also be able to attend the world-famous New Year’s Eve celebration as well.

Goa in Summer

Goa in summer is not the best time to visit. The months of March to June are the summer months in Goa and are also not the most recommended time for travelers and tourists to visit this little beach town on the western coast of the Indian subcontinent. The humidity remains high and the temperature also rises to as much as 40 Degree Celsius. Sure if you stay by the beach you will get tanned and will also experience cool breezy beach vibes. But it would be almost impossible to go out and go sightseeing. This is also not the tourist season in Goa due to its extreme weather conditions. However, if you are looking to explore the culture of Goa and without the presence of many tourists everywhere then this is the right time since you may also get to experience local festivals like Goa cashew and coconut festival and Shigmo parade.

Goa in Monsoon

The months of July to September mark the monsoon and rainy days in Goa. If you think about sandy beaches and sunshine in Goa is common then visiting Goa during this month will completely change your mind. This is also not the most preferred time to visit Goa especially if you are planning on fun-packed and adrenaline-pumping activities since most of these activities and water sports are discontinued for the season. This beach town remains washed with wind, gushing rainfall, and unfavorable conditions for even a beach day out. However, if you still would love to visit Goa during this off-season when everything is wet and it rains almost every day, then these monsoon months are the best time to visit Goa for you with July being the wettest month in Goa.

Goa in Winter

November to February are the best time to visit Goa if you are looking to have a wholesome time. The weather is ideal to indulge in several fun water sports activities and indulge in a fun and memorable holiday. The weather remains very cool, breezy, and comfortable accompanied by a little bit of chill during nighttime. The temperature remains in the comfortable range of 20 to 28 Degree Celsius with the humidity levels remaining at moderate levels. This has to be the best time to visit Goa without a doubt.

Best time to visit for Adventure seekers

Goa is the ultimate beach vacation destination due to the presence of expansive water sports activities and topography that will take you through waterfalls, forests, and lakes. For any adventure enthusiast, December to January is an excellent choice of months if you are looking to have an adventure-packed holiday in Goa. Warm days and relatively cooler nights, trekking, sightseeing, and water sports activities are all available and the best time to have a thrilling and adrenaline-pumping holiday in this beach destination. Alternatively, if you are looking for a budget adventure holiday experience in Goa then summer or early monsoon season is recommended. From October to May tourists and travelers love indulging in sports activities like scuba diving, parasailing, jet-skiing, banana boat riding, and many more.

Best time to visit for honeymoon couples

Goa is one of the most preferred holiday destinations for couples on their honeymoon. With white sandy beaches, luxury resorts, romantic cruises, and a thumping and exciting nightlife, honeymooning in Goa is truly an experience that everyone should experience at least once in a lifetime. For a honeymooning couple, November to February is suggested since the weather is perfect and all the services and amenities are readily available.

Knowing when it is the best time to visit Goa is just as crucial as knowing what you would love to explore once there. As mentioned earlier the late monsoon to the winter and through the spring season is a great time to plan a holiday trip to Goa which can be a solo trip, honeymoon holiday, holidaying with a group of friends, or just an outing with your loved ones and family.

Suggested Tours

  • Goa Tour Packages
  • Goa Weekend Tour
  • Goa Honeymoon Tour
